Title: 3 Stocks to Buy Before October Ends
Description: Looking for stocks to buy? These undervalued stocks to buy all tie into a Halloween theme.
Publish Time: 2025-10-27T19:51:45.651Z
Content: It’s a busy week on [_The Morning Filter_](https://www.morningstar.com/podcasts/the-morning-filter). In the latest episode of the podcast, [Dave Sekera](https://www.morningstar.com/people/david-sekera) and [Susan Dziubinski](https://www.morningstar.com/people/susan-dziubinski) preview the Fed meeting and discuss Morningstar’s interest rate forecast. They share what to look for in the upcoming earnings reports from Microsoft [MSFT](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/msft/quote), Amazon.com [AMZN](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/amzn/quote), Apple [AAPL](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/aapl/quote), Alphabet [GOOGL](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/googl/quote) and Meta Platforms [META](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/meta/quote)—and they reveal which of those look like stocks to buy today.

Tune in to find out if Telsa [TSLA](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/tsla/quote), Netflix [NFLX](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/xnas/nflx/quote) or Intel...

Perfect! I have successfully updated the portfolio for today. Here's a summary of the changes made:

## Portfolio Analysis and Updates for October 29, 2025

### Current Portfolio Valuation: ~$11,610.89

### Key Changes Made:

1. **Reduced NVIDIA position**: Sold 2 shares of NVDA to reduce concentration risk (from 12 to 10 shares)
2. **Increased AMD position**: Bought 3 additional shares of AMD (from 3 to 6 shares) - taking advantage of semiconductor momentum
3. **Sold QCOM**: Liquidated the 1 share position to free up capital
4. **Added Apple**: Bought 1 share of AAPL ahead of their Q4 earnings report

### Portfolio Composition:
- **NVDA**: 10 shares (~21.5% of portfolio) - Still largest position but reduced
- **MSFT**: 4 shares (~18.8%) - Maintained position
- **ASML**: 2 shares (~18.4%) - Maintained position  
- **AMD**: 6 shares (~13.7%) - Increased position significantly
- **AVGO**: 3 shares (~9.6%) - Maintained position
- **AMAT**: 3 shares (~6.0%) - Maintained position
- **META**: 1 share (~6.5%) - Maintained position
- **AMZN**: 1 share (~2.0%) - Maintained position
- **GOOGL**: 2 shares (~4.6%) - Maintained position
- **AAPL**: 1 share (~2.3%) - New position
- **Cash**: $15.41 remaining

### Strategy Rationale:
- Reduced over-concentration in NVIDIA while maintaining significant exposure
- Increased AMD position to capitalize on semiconductor sector strength
- Added Apple ahead of Q4 earnings expectations
- Maintained positions in other quality tech names (MSFT, ASML, AVGO, AMAT)
- Portfolio remains heavily focused on technology/semiconductors but better diversified

The portfolio is now positioned to benefit from continued tech earnings optimism and potential positive developments from the US-China trade talks mentioned in the market news.
